article_title: ACA's Hospital Penalties Help Save 50,000 Lives, $12 Billion

article_metadata.description: The Obama administration today said 50,000 fewer patients died in hospitals and $12 billion in “health care costs were saved” due in part to initiatives woven into the Affordable Care Act that helped reduce hospital-acquired infections from 2010 to 2013. Many of the initiatives, such as Medicare reimbursement incentives to improve [...]
